title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library to pull, build, and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: First-party JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama REST API; works in Node, Bun, Deno, and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; sync & async chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, LLM, and embeddings nodes.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-like web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-GUI); folders, share, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library (Maven) wrapping Ollama REST endpoints with fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chat, generate, pull, and list operations against local Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use local Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, voice chat, PDF-QA, Next.js, Tauri desktop, etc.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image + compose stacks with GPU (CUDA/ROCm) and CPU variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG server combining Ollama LLM with sentence-transformers and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into channels via mentions or DMs.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package (JS wrapper) for Ollama REST API – 40k weekly downloads.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package – Python bindings for chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama on Reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing modelfiles, benchmarks, GPU tweaks, and integrations.

title: ollama Hacker News launch
summary: Discussion thread covering Ollama’s macOS Metal performance vs. llama.cpp forks.
